metaData.label: myTargets GARDASIL9
metaData.criteriaDescription: My_Target_vod__C equal 1 AND ( Territory_vod__c begins with BR_D OR Territory_vod__c begins with BR_C OR Territory_vod__c begins with BR_RO )
